participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, Emily is passionate about music and dreams of making a name for herself in the industry. She is determined and hardworking, balancing her musical aspirations with her job as a custodian.
participant_1.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, Mark navigates the challenges of single fatherhood while pursuing his passion for music production. He is practical and tends to focus on his work in the studio, valuing his time spent with his kids.
participant_2.background: i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio. i prefer being inside. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer.
